typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		emp_id as short,
		Name as string,
		country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select emp_id,Name,country from emp_dept where department = \'1\'',
	format: 'query',
	wildcardPaths:['emp.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> employee
employee derive(country = iif(isNull(country),'Unknown',upper(country)),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DerivedCountry
DerivedCountry sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		emp_id,
		Name,
		country
	)) ~> empdata
